comments.body:
Changing JSP Expression <%= %> to use direct text instead, the error 
message "Array Index Out Of Bounds Exception" is shown, so I fixed the array 
error and the bug is gone!

Thanks

description:
Some times when a jsp page is called, the html code is not complete but all the jsp instructions are executed. The next html code are the last two lines of html generated, you can see the incomplete td line and of course, the /tr, /table etc, is not generated and the shown page looks truncated
 
<
